text:
I haven't broached it with
management yet, but we have KACE on-prem, and I'm not terribly happy with it for
patching, and it's been problematic for deployments, though the inventory part
of it is fine. I've been approached by Automox, and I'm considering a trial of
it because of its integration with Rapid7 InsightVM/InsightConnect. We'd have to
buy InsightConnect and Automox, so a budgetary case needs to be made, but I'm
pondering it. Kurt

metadata.subject: Re: [patchmanagement] If not Ivanti, what?
metadata.email_text_original:
